docstring.long_description:
Inputs
------
default : OrderedPair|OrderedTriple|DataFrame|Vector|Matrix|Grayscale
    the DataContainer to be visualized
docstring.short_description: Create a Plotly Heatmap visualization for a given input DataContainer.

parameters.name: show_text
parameters.description: whether or not to show the text inside the heatmap color blocks

parameters.name: histogram
parameters.description: whether or not to render a histogram of the image next to the render

returns.description: the DataContainer containing the Plotly heatmap visualization
